description: Rear roof extension, and installation of three roof lights to front roof slope
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawings titled:

Existing GF_1F Plan (Drawing number: A10) (Revision P1); Location plan (Drawing number: A01) (Revision P1); Existing 2F_Roof Plan (Drawing number: A11) (Revision P1); Proposed GF_1F Plan (Drawing number: A100) (Revision P1); Existing Sections (Drawing number: A30) (Revision P1); Location Plan (Drawing number: A01) (Revision P1); Existing Elevation (Drawing number: A20) (Revision P1); Proposed 2F_Roof Plan (Drawing number: A101) (Revision P1); Proposed Elevation (Drawing number: A110) (Revision P1); Proposed Section (Drawing number: A130) (Revision P1);
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless where stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies 7.4 & 7.6 of the London Plan (2016) and Policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), polices 1.1 (k) and 1.2 (f) of the adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2012).

| Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any subsequent amendment, revision or new Order) no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the building permitted.

Reason:  To protect residential amenity, in accordance with Policies 7.4 & 7.6 of the London Plan (2016) and Policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), polices 1.1 (k) and 1.2 (f) of the adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2012).
| The proposed rooflights hereby approved shall not project more than 150mm from the roof plane and retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and in the interests of good neighbourliness and in accordance with policies 7.4 an 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013).
